name: @speechly/browser-ui
description: Ready-made UI components to build a reactive voice interface to a web site or app. Uses Speechly's real-time cloud API for speech-to-text and NLU.

scripts.build: rimraf core && rollup -c --silent && mv core/types/src/* core && rimraf core/types
scripts.staging: set -o allexport;. ./.env.local;set +o allexport && test -n "$REACT_APP__DEPLOY_STAGING_URI" && pnpm run build && rsync -avz --delete core/ $REACT_APP__DEPLOY_STAGING_URI
